title: Dazzling Diamond Cut Kangan - Graceful Bangles
materials: 22K Yellow Gold. Features brilliant-cut white cubic zirconia (CZ) stones.
features: These bangles showcase a modern diamond-cut design with four CZ stones set elegantly along the sleek, tapering gold band. The minimalist design allows for comfortable everyday wear while adding a touch of sparkle.
colors: Warm Yellow Gold accented by the dazzling white CZ stones.
occasions: or as a subtle touch of elegance to festive attire. A great gift for birthdays
or as a simple token of appreciation.
description: Lightweight and comfortable, these bangles offer a modern take on a traditional accessory. The 22K gold ensures lasting shine and value, while the CZ stones provide a touch of sparkle without breaking the bank. Their simple design makes them versatile enough to be paired with any outfit.
